channel.title: mobile on Pensieve
channel.description: Recent content in mobile on Pensieve

item.title: Setup Gitlab-CI for mobile
item.description: Copy CI files from cimonster Project https://gitlab.ants.house/cimonster/fe/mobile cp -a ~/cimonster/fe/mobile/fastlane . cp ~/cimonster/fe/mobile/Gemfile . bundle update cp ~/cimonster/fe/mobile/.gitlab-ci.yml . cp -a ~/cimonster/fe/mobile/ci . gitlab-ci.yml If the project does not deviate from the standard structure only the PROJECT_NAME variable must be adapted. iOS Certificates, Identifiers & Profiles https://developer.apple.com/account/resources/certificates/list Create new App ID Create new distribution profile $projectname-DISTRIBUTION. Create new development profile $projectname-DEV. Appstoreconnect https://appstoreconnect.apple.com Create app Xcode Set bundle identifier auf house.
